Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/California
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Western, 99th and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Western, 99th and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Damen
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Marquette, Ashland, and 69th due to, street blockage at 67th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Marquette, Ashland, and 69th due to, street blockage at 67th/Damen.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Bryn Mawr due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Bryn Mawr due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
